posts.text:
Good old Ssangyong Musso, ‘96 diesel, M.Benz engine, turbo, 190,000 km, manual transmission, in Reykjavik,
-> price: 140,000 kr + 50,000 kr for the extra set of (almost new) winter tires; reason sale: leaving Iceland - THURSDAY!
Góður gamall Ssangyong Musso, ‘96, dísil, M.Benz vél, 190þ km, verð 140þ + 50þ kr fyrir nagladekk
Annalisa & Paul - 
annalisa.decia@gmail.com
 - sími 6622971
